title: vandE mAtharam enbOm
sahitya:
vandE mAtaram enbom engaL mAnilat-tAyai vaNangudum enbOm
caraNam 1 jAti madangaLaip-pArOm uyar janmam id-deshattil eidina rAyin
vEdiyarAyinum onrE anri vEru kulattinarAyinum onre

   caraNam 2  Inap-paraiyargaLEnum avar emmuDan vAzht-tingiruppavar anrO
shInattarAi viDuvArO pira dEshattar pOrppala tIngizhaippArO

   caraNam 3  Ayiram uNDikku jAti enil anniyar vandu pughal enna nIti Or
 tAyin vayiTril pirandOr tammun shaNDai sheidAlum sahOdarar anrO

   caraNam 4  onru paTTAl uNDu vAzhvE nammil oTrumai nIngil anaivarkkum tAzhvE
nanridu tErttiDal vENDum inda jnAnam vandArppin namakkedu vENDum

   caraNam 5  eppadam vAittiDumEnum nammil yAvarkkum anda nilai poduvAgum
muppadu kOTiyum vAzhvOm vIzhil muppadu kOTi muzhumaiyum vIzhvOm

    caraNam 6  pullaDimait-tozhil pENip-paNDu pOyina nATKaLuk-kini manam nANit-
tollai igazhcigaL tIra indat-toNDu nilaimaiyai tUvenru taLLi
